title: New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety                    Keeping our visitors safe is one of New Bedford Whaling National Historical Parks highest priorities.                   New Bedford is an active urban setting, with traffic that is common to most cities. Please maintain awareness when crossing streets and while strolling the historic area. The cobblestones, while authentic and quaint, can also be tripping hazards.         EMERGENCIES CALL 911
